item.title: Need Help With D Claw Spec Hitting 4 Times
item.dc:creator: @kidzcoder kidzcoder
item.description:
@kidzcoder wrote:

  1. search for this:
public class client extends Player implements Runnable {

should be directly near the top.

  1. now under that add:

Code:

public boolean DCDamg = false;
public int DCdown = 0;

3)now search for:

Code:

if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 5698
[/code[
and should see something like this:




Code:
[code]

if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 5698 && specialAmount > 24){
startAnimation(0x426);
specialAtkNPC(false, 0, 252, 0x426);
getHit(25);
DDS2Damg = true;
DDStimer = 1;
startAnimation(0x426);
usingSpecial = true;
specialAmount -= 25;
int j = PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].absX;
int k = PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].absY;
int l = PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].playerLevel[playerHitpoints];
}
[/code]


4) Now right under that add:




Code:
[code]
if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 8002 && specialAmount > 49){
specialAtk(true, 50, 252, 2068);
DCdown = 4;
DCDamg = true;
getHit(8);
usingSpecial = true;
}
[/code]
5) now for the npcs, search this from where u added the code above:

[code]

Code:
if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 5698
[/code]
u should see this:




Code:
[code]
if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 5698 && specialAmount > 24){
specialAtkNPC(true, 25, 252, 0x426);
npcDamage(8);
}
[/code]
under that add this:

[code]


Code:
if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 8002 && specialAmount > 49){
specialAtkNPC(true, 50, 282, 2068);
DCdown = 4;
DCDamg = true;
npcDamage(8);
}
[/code]
6) now search for:

[code]


Code:
public boolean process() {
[/code]

under that add this:

[code]


Code:
if ((IsAttackingNPC) && DCDamg == true ) {
if (DCdown == 2 ) {
startAnimation(2068);
}
SpecDamgNPC(30);
DCdown -= 1;
if (DCdown == 0 ) {
DCDamg = false;
}
}
if (IsAttacking == true && DCDamg == true ) {
if (DCdown == 2 ) {
startAnimation(2068);
}
SpecDamg(25);
DCdown -= 1;
if (DCdown == 0 ) {
DCDamg = false;
}
}
[/code]
now you can save and compile.

7) open your special.java and add thsi under:




Code:
[code]
case 5698:
[/code]
you will have to search case 5698: 2 times because there are 2 of them.

now under both of the 2 cases 5698: add this:

[code]


Code:
case 8002:
[/code]
save and compile and you are done.

Read full topic
item.source: Need Help With D Claw Spec Hitting 4 Times

item.title: Need Help With D Claw Spec Hitting 4 Times
item.dc:creator: @FinalFantasy FinalFantasy
item.description:
@FinalFantasy wrote:

[quote=“faded vision, post:6, topic:268187”][quote author=EatU4Dinner link=topic=353975.msg2712262#msg2712262 date=1237400899]
specialAmount > 24){

make the 24 100 i think.
[/quote]lololol!!! your so retarded …

that means you cant spec under full spec? thats what the 100 is. retard…

First make your special look like this

if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 8002 && specialAmount > 24){ specialAtk(true, 25, 252, 2068); DCdown = 4; DCDamg = true; getHit(100); usingSpecial = true; }

And this for npc

if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 8002 && specialAmount > 24){ specialAtkNPC(true, 25, 252, 2068); DCdown = 4; DCDamg = true; npcDamage(8); }

Declare these

public boolean DCDamg = false; public int DCdown = 0;

Find

public boolean process()

Under it put

if ((IsAttackingNPC) && DCDamg == true ) { if (DCdown == 2 ) { startAnimation(2068); } SpecDamgNPC(30); DCdown -= 1; if (DCdown == 0 ) { DCDamg = false; } }

And

if (IsAttacking == true && DCDamg == true ) { if (DCdown == 2 ) { startAnimation(2068); } SpecDamg(25); DCdown -= 1; if (DCdown == 0 ) { DCDamg = false; } }[/quote]

tysm!!

Read full topic

item.title: Need Help With D Claw Spec Hitting 4 Times
item.dc:creator: @faded_vision Faded Vision
item.description:
@faded_vision wrote:

[quote=“EatU4Dinner, post:2, topic:268187”]specialAmount > 24){

make the 24 100 i think.[/quote]lololol!!! your so retarded …

that means you cant spec under full spec? thats what the 100 is. retard…

First make your special look like this

if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 8002 && specialAmount > 24){ specialAtk(true, 25, 252, 2068); DCdown = 4; DCDamg = true; getHit(100); usingSpecial = true; }

And this for npc

if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 8002 && specialAmount > 24){ specialAtkNPC(true, 25, 252, 2068); DCdown = 4; DCDamg = true; npcDamage(8); }

Declare these

public boolean DCDamg = false; public int DCdown = 0;

Find

public boolean process()

Under it put

if ((IsAttackingNPC) && DCDamg == true ) { if (DCdown == 2 ) { startAnimation(2068); } SpecDamgNPC(30); DCdown -= 1; if (DCdown == 0 ) { DCDamg = false; } }

And

if (IsAttacking == true && DCDamg == true ) { if (DCdown == 2 ) { startAnimation(2068); } SpecDamg(25); DCdown -= 1; if (DCdown == 0 ) { DCDamg = false; } }

Read full topic

item.title: Need Help With D Claw Spec Hitting 4 Times
item.dc:creator: @FinalFantasy FinalFantasy
item.description:
@FinalFantasy wrote:

Well it’s not as easy for me as it is for everyone else, my specials are coded differently, like this:

if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 5698 && specialAmount > 24){ specialAtkNPC(true, 25, 252, 0x426); npcDamage(8); }

If your wondering what the specialAtkNPC is, ill show you:

public void specialAtkNPC(boolean hitTwice, int specDrain, int projectileHit, int emoteSet) {

So the only thing i can figure out is that the max times a spec can hit is twice, ive already tried something like this:

if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 5698 && specialAmount > 24){ specialAtkNPC(true, 25, 252, 0x426); specialAtkNPC(true, 25, 252, 0x426); npcDamage(8); }

and it doesn’t work.

So could anyone help me?

I’m Using ddsspeced source, which I think is deltascape, idk.

Read full topic
